document_data.caption: A wolveraven.
document_data.name: Wolveraven
document_data.mainbody: A '''wolveraven''' was type of [[duhlarkin]] created by [[Duhlark Kolat]] himself using the ''[[Duhlark's animerge]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Description: These carnivorous creatures were a combination of a [[giant raven]] and [[wolverine]]. A wolveraven had a wingspan of {{SI|7|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Combat: Wolveravens attacked with their hind claws, strong bite, and wing spurs.
document_data.History: Duhlark created four different wolveravens and bred six others from those, so he considered this version of a duhlarkin to be a success. He gave one of them to [[Khelben Arunsun]] as a gift. Duhlark released several of his wolveravens into the mountains north of [[Waterdeep]] where they helped control the populations of [[mountain goat]]s and [[peryton]]s.
